data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Free kick for Udinese in the half of Lazio.
In the minute 4, Joaquin Correa for Lazio drives towards goal at Stadio Olimpico. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Lazio to take a throw-in in Udinese territory.
Throw-in for Udinese in the half of Lazio.
In the minute 7, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Udinese have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Udinese.
In the minute 10, Gianluca Aureliano awards Lazio a goal kick.
Can Udinese capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lazio's half?
Can Udinese get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lazio's half?
In the minute 15, Udinese have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Aureliano.
In Rome Lazio drive forward through Danilo Cataldi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
The match at Stadio Olimpico has been interrupted briefly for a check on Tolgay Arslan, who is down injured.
In the minute 17, Udinese’s Tolgay Arslan is on his feet again at Stadio Olimpico.
Fernando Forestieri (Udinese) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Gianluca Aureliano signals a Udinese throw-in in Lazio's half.
In the minute 18, Goal! Tolgay Arslan gives Udinese a 0-1 lead in Rome.
Roberto Pereyra with an assist there.
Gianluca Aureliano awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 22, Throw-in Udinese.
Udinese push forward at Stadio Olimpico and Rodrigo De Paul gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lazio defence.
In the minute 23, Rodrigo De Paul is back on the pitch.
Rodrigo De Paul is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Aureliano.
Udinese drives forward and Samir gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Udinese.
In Rome a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Lazio have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Aureliano.
In the minute 28, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Udinese.
Fernando Forestieri (Udinese) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 29, Lazio have a goal kick.
Can Lazio capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Tolgay Arslan is booked for the away team.
In the minute 33, Lazio's Luis Alberto gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Udinese defender.
Gianluca Aureliano signals a free kick to Lazio.
Ball safe as Lazio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 34, Attention is being given to Udinese’s Rodrigo De Paul and play has been suspended briefly.
Rodrigo De Paul has recovered and rejoins the match in Rome.
Throw-in for Lazio in the half of Udinese.
In the minute 37, Gianluca Aureliano signals a free kick to Lazio.
Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Lazio at Stadio Olimpico.
In the minute 41, Can Udinese get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lazio's half?
Throw-in for Lazio in their own half.
Free kick for Lazio in their own half.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Lazio.
Goal kick for Udinese at Stadio Olimpico.
Udinese are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 43, Mohamed Fares (Lazio) gets a yellow card.
Ignacio Pussetto's header is off-target for Udinese.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rome.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Udinese needs to be cautious. Lazio have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, Lazio drive forward but Mohamed Fares is judged offside.
Free kick for Lazio in the half of Udinese.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Roberto Pereyra (Udinese) has received a yellow card from Gianluca Aureliano.
At Stadio Olimpico, Samir has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 45, Great finish from Ignacio Pussetto to give Udinese a 0-2 lead.
Great play from Rodrigo De Paul to set up the goal.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
In Rome, Luis Alberto of Lazio is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Adam Marusic is replacing Mohamed Fares for the home team.
Jean Akpa is replacing Marco Parolo for Lazio at Stadio Olimpico.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Danilo Cataldi with Lucas Leiva. This is the third substitution made today by Simone Inzaghi.
Lazio's Lucas Leiva gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Udinese goal kick.
Udinese awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gianluca Aureliano signals a throw-in for Lazio, close to Udinese's area.
In the minute 53, Lazio to take a throw-in in Udinese territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Lazio in Rome.
Gianluca Aureliano awards Udinese a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Udinese in their own half.
Gianluca Aureliano signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
Gianluca Aureliano signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 55, Lazio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joaquin Correa of Lazio smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
Gianluca Aureliano signals a Lazio throw-in in Udinese's half.
In the minute 57, Luca Gotti (Udinese) is making a first substitution, with Mato Jajalo replacing Tolgay Arslan.
Luca Gotti is making the team's second substitution at Stadio Olimpico with Nahuel Molina replacing Marvin Zeegelaar.
In the minute 58, Udinese awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lazio are whistled for offside.
Free kick Udinese.
In the minute 62, Lazio pushes forward through Ciro Immobile, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Lazio.
In the minute 63, Lazio have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Aureliano.
Simone Inzaghi is making the team's fourth substitution at Stadio Olimpico with Felipe Caicedo replacing Luis Alberto.
Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gianluca Aureliano signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Lazio in their own half.
Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lazio push upfield but Gianluca Aureliano quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 69, Ball goes out of play for a Lazio goal kick.
Throw-in for Lazio close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 71, Goal! Fernando Forestieri extends Udinese's lead to 0-3.
Lazio have been given a penalty...
Juan Musso (Udinese) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 74, Goal! Ciro Immobile nets a penalty for Lazio. They now trail 1-3.
Gianluca Aureliano awards the home team a throw-in.
Fernando Forestieri (Udinese) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 76, Gianluca Aureliano signals a free kick to Lazio in their own half.
Andreas Pereira is on a sub for Patric for Lazio.
Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 77, Lucas Leiva (Lazio) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in Udinese.
Udinese make their third substitution with Walace replacing Fernando Forestieri.
In the minute 81, Udinese needs to be cautious. Lazio have an attacking throw-in.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Rome to check on Samir, who is grimacing with pain.
Udinese's Samir looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 84, Felipe Caicedo (Lazio) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Udinese defenders.
Throw-in for Lazio at Stadio Olimpico.
Important block from the Udinese defence as Ciro Immobile fires in a strike for Lazio.
In the minute 85, Gianluca Aureliano signals a free kick to Udinese.
In Rome Lazio attack through Adam Marusic. The finish is off target, however.
Udinese have a goal kick.
In the minute 89, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Lazio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
Ball safe as Lazio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Udinese.
In Rome a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Lazio to take a throw-in in Udinese territory.
That's full-time at Stadio Olimpico. The final score is 1-3.
Jean Akpa (Lazio) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
